title: May, 2022
content: One paper about Named Entity Recognition is accepted by IEEE TITS.

title: May, 2022
content: One paper about traffic pattern inference is accepted by IEEE TVT.

title: April, 2022
content: I am selected as one of the CPS Rising Stars 2022.

title: April, 2022
content: I will be joining the Department of Computer Science at Florida State University as a tenure-track assistant professor in 2022 Fall. I am looking for motivated Ph.D. and M.S. students, and undergraduate researchers. If you are interested, please email me with a copy of your CV to start a conversation.

title: December, 2021
content: Our paper about using Reinforcement Learning for instant delivery received the Outstanding Paper Award from IEEE RTSS 2021.

title: November, 2021
content: I was invited to serve as the TPC member of the Web Conference (WWW 2022).

title: November, 2021
content: I was invited to give a talk at AI TIME.

title: November, 2021
content: I was invited to give a guest lecture at Lehigh University.

title: October, 2021
content: One paper about human mobility verification is accepted by ACM IMWUT/UbiComp 2022.

title: September, 2021
content: I join MIT as a Postdoctoral Associate.

title: September, 2021
content: I present our paper about user behavior in car sharing services at UbiComp 2021.

title: August, 2021
content: I have successfully defended my Ph.D. thesis. CheersÔºÅ

content: One paper about fault prediction of railway systems is accepted by IEEE TITS.

content: I present our paper about electric carsharing fleet management at KDD 2021.

title: August, 2021
content: One paper about deep reinforcement learning for instant delivery dispatching is accepted by IEEE RTSS 2021.

title: July, 2021
content: One paper about multi-agent reinforcement learning for train control is accepted by Control Engineering Practice.

title: June, 2021
content: I participate in the Summer Institutes in Computational Social Science (SICSS-Beijing). Website: https://sicss.io/2021/beijing/ . Wonderful experience.

title: June, 2021
content: Two papers are accepted by IEEE ITSC 2021. One is about Named Entity Recognition, the other is about Topic Model for fault prediction.

title: June, 2021
content: I was invited to give a guest lecture at Southeast University.

title: May, 2021
content: Two papers are accepted by KDD 2021. One is about electric carsharing fleet management, the other is about Large-Scale Driving Pattern Characterization for Usage-based Insurance

title: April, 2021
content: I present our paper about deep reinforcement learning based electric taxi fleet management at IEEE ICDE 2021.

title: April, 2021
content: I attend the 2021 NSF Smart & Connected Communities Principal Investigators' Meeting.

content: Working as a visiting student at MIT Media Lab with Prof. Alex 'Sandy' Pentland.
